full_description:
Apacer AH651 32GB USB 3.2 Gen 1 Fingerprint Flash Drive

The Apacer AH651 32GB USB 3.2 Gen 1 Fingerprint Flash Drive is a compact and secure storage solution that offers convenient and reliable data transfer. With a capacity of 32GB, it provides ample space for storing various files, including documents, photos, videos, and more. The flash drive utilizes the Super Speed USB 3.2 Gen 1 interface, which ensures fast and efficient data transfer speeds. It is also backward compatible with USB 2.0, allowing it to work seamlessly with older devices. The Apacer AH651 is its built-in capacitive sensing fingerprint recognition technology. This advanced biometric feature allows for secure and convenient access to the data stored on the flash drive. It can store up to 10 sets of fingerprints, making it ideal for personal or shared use. Additionally, it supports a password login function, enabling an extra layer of protection with a single set of password credentials. The flash drive is designed to be user-friendly and hassle-free. It supports plug and play functionality, meaning it can be easily connected to a computer or compatible device without the need for any additional software installation. The USB bus powers it, eliminating the requirement for an external power supply. The Apacer AH651 also offers the option of allocating partition sizes. This feature allows users to create multiple partitions on the drive, effectively dividing the storage space and organizing the data according to their preferences.

360° All-angle Fingerprint Recognition

The Apacer AH651 32GB USB 3.2 Gen 1 Fingerprint Flash Drive Only the authorized fingerprint owner can access AH651, thanks to its adoption of the latest capacitive sensing fingerprint recognition technology. The 360° all-angle reading can detect finger-press from any direction with precision to unlock quickly.

Dual Unlocking Options: Fingerprint Recognition and Password

In addition to fingerprint access, AH651 is further equipped with a password login function. Users may conveniently choose the appropriate access method depending on the situation.

Dual Storage Partition, Enhance Your Data Security

The memory space is divided into 2 parts. The public partition can be used to keep less sensitive data, directly accessed like any regular USB flash drive. The secure partition offers encrypted safety, accessible only by fingerprint recognition or password.

Allocable Partition Size

The Apacer AH651 32GB USB 3.2 Gen 1 Fingerprint Flash Drive Depending on needs, the administrators can allocate different memory storage sizes to each partition.
